title: Profile - Edit Mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (11.5.0 or greater iOS, 12.0.0 or greater Android)
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app

Relevant links:
*Mocks:[Figma](https://www.figma.com/file/M3vqmrFe2eJlofe392hAqY/Specs?node-id=1284%3A14013)
EDIT MODE:
*iOS:[BP-9188](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9188)
*Android:[BPA-6461](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6461)
custom_steps:
WHEN user is on Profile view 
AND User tap on Edit button [Pencil in Circle icon]
custom_expected:
THEN user will be taken to the First/ Last name edit form 

Design:
[IOS] 
Title: 'Edit Profile' in center 
X icon top right 
[ANDROID] 
Title: 'Profile Edit' justified left
Back nav arrow icon top left


[BOTH PLATFORMS]
User avatar initials as First Name / Last name initials 
First Name field 
Last Name field 
Submit CTA (blue button with white text)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User is on edit form 
AND user removes all the characters the First name field
AND user navigates to the Last name field
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the error text "First name is required."

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User is on edit form 
AND user removes all the characters the Last name field
AND user navigates to the First name field
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the error text "Last name is required."

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User is on edit form 
AND user types more than 40 characters in the First name field
AND user navigates to the Last name field
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the error text "First Name must be 40 characters or less"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User is on edit form 
AND user types more than 40 characters in the Last name field
AND user navigates to the First name field
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the error text "Last Name must be 40 characters or less"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user enter valid First name and Last name 
AND tap on Save (Submit as it shows in design)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will see the saving animation
AND user will be taken back to Profile view
AND user will be able to see my recently modified name updated

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user enter valid First name and Last name with multiple names (i.e Vlad Guerrero Jr., Michael Harris II, Isiah Kiner-Falefa)
AND tap on Save (Submit as it shows in design)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will see the saving animation
AND user will be taken back to Profile view
AND user will be able to see my recently modified name updated
AND user will see the first initials shown of first/last name in the avatar

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User is on edit form AND makes changes to the name fields 

[iOS]
BUT user taps on 'X' to dismiss

[ANDROID]
BUT user taps on back nav arrow '<-' to dismiss
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[iOS] 
THEN user will be taken back to Profile view
AND User will be able to see the names NOT updated

[ANDROID] 
THEN user is shown 'Discard Changes? Your profile changes have not been saved.' w/ 'Keep Editing' and 'Discard' CTA
AND User will be able to discard the changes OR keep editing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user enters valid and different First name and/or Last name 
AND tap on Save (Submit as it shows in design) 
AND user quit the app, and restarts the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user updated data for profile name should be maintained

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user enters valid and different First name and/or Last name 
AND tap on Save (Submit as it shows in design) 
AND user log out of the app and log back in
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user updated data for profile name should be maintained

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user have no network connection*
AND user enters valid and different First name and/or Last name 
AND tap on Save (Submit as it shows in design) 


*device set to airplane mode can be done to simulate
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the error text “Sorry, check your network and try again."

title: Origin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID 12.8.0 or later, iOS 12.3.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User has tickets to an upcoming game to PHI*
custom_steps:
GIVEN User display with Context Card for GoAhead-Entry(FFI) Registration on Home Tab*

*iOS currently using Banner Link ' Go-Ahead Onboarding' (build 2266)- home context card functionality to come w/ a future build

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User is on the Home Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I am displayed a Home GoAheadEntry context card

custom_steps_separated.content: When User taps on Home GoAheadEntry context card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN "MLB Go-Ahead Entry" should be announced
AND "A hands-free way to enter the Ballpark. Sign up for free." on List should be announced.

custom_steps_separated.content: When User taps on Register button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN "Register" button should be announced

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user lands on GO-AHEAD ENTRY flow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User displays with Get Started screen with title of GO-AHEAD ENTRY

AND the initial page text announced:
Title: Sign up for MLB's Go-Ahead Entry at Citizens Bank Park

Description: Register for MLB Go-Ahead Entry, the ultimate hands-free experience available for free to ticketed fans entering Citizens Bank Park.

AND a middle section will be shown that allows swiping to additional pages w/ further instructions
 1 out 3 adjustable swipe right to left
AND a button shown w/ text 'Get Started' [button is disabled initially]

AND a checkbox is announced  w/ text 'By tapping "Get Started" I agree to MLB's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy' [checkbox is unchecked initially]

*Terms of Use is a link directing user to external browser with Terms
*Privacy Policy is a link directing user to external browser with Policy
AND a checkbox is announced  w/ text 'I attest that I am eighteen (18) years of age or older.' [checkbox is unchecked initially]
AND Cancel or X button on the Top left to dismiss the GoAhead registration should be announced

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scroll left (2 fingers) to right (2nd screen)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user display an instruction for the complete the flow

And the second Page text announced:
Title: First we'll capture an image of your face.

Description: This image will be used by a service provider solely to create an alphanumeric MLB Go-Ahead ID for you and then immediately discarded.
AND 'Learn more' CTA underlined, double tap to activate it

AND Get Started button remains disabled
AND Terms and Services checkbox is displayed without check
AND Age confirmation checkbox is displayed without check
AND Cancel or X button on the Top left to dismiss the GoAhead registration should be announced

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scroll left (2 fingers) to right (3rd screen)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user continues with display an instruction for the complete flow

And the third Page text announced:
Title: At the ballpark, head to a Go-Ahead Entry lane at the First Base Gate

Description: Your tickets will already be tied to your Go-Ahead ID. All ticketed individuals in your group will be captured by the Go-Ahead cameras.
AND 'Learn more' CTA underlined, double tap to activate it

AND Get Started button remains disabled
AND Terms and Services checkbox is displayed without check
AND Age confirmation checkbox is displayed without check
AND Cancel or X button on the Top left to dismiss the GoAhead registration should be announced

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User acknowledges Terms and Privacy (double tap to toggle)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be able to checkmark MLB ID Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

(Checkbox filled up with black color)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User acknowledges Age (double tap to toggle)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
AND User should be able to checkmark the age stipulation
I attest that I am eighteen (18) years of age or older.

(Checkbox filled up with black color)
THEN Get Started button should be enabled with black color in white text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'Get Started' within the Go-Ahead Entry page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[SKIP VALIDATION IF CAMERA ACCESS WAS PREV ALLOWED - PROCEED TO EXPECTATION STEP 17]

THEN  Camera Prompt announced

Android/iOS:
Standard Existing Camera Promot modal OR
"Ballpark" Would Like to Access the Camera
Ballpark uses the camera to capture photos and videos.

AND 'Don't Allow' and 'Okay' CTAs announced

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap Okay (Permission allowed)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user should be granted with an interface provides a clear indication of the action that requires approval to capture confirmation

GO-AHEAD ENTRY shows in Home Plate with MLB logo

Description:
We’ll take a quick capture to generate your MLB Go-Ahead ID

AND 'Continue' CTA announced

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on Continue
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be directed to capture their facial image

Text display:
Keep your face in the frame ....

[iOS verbiage may differ - i.e. No Faces were detected inside the frame.]
AND Cancel or X button on the Top left to dismiss the GoAhead registration should be announced

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user successfully captured their facial image for Go-Ahead ID
AND NEC acceptance met
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Home plate icon should show in green color with MLB standard logo in it (SKIP THIS FOR 12.3 iOS and 12.8 ANDROID)

AND user display with loading indicator displayed when image validation is in-progress

AND lottie animation within home plate shows on screen while generating Go-Ahead ID

Text display:
Generating Go-Ahead ID...

THEN user should display with confirmation screen for successful enrollment in GoAhead announced

Green (dotted) check icon mark
Text:
You're all set!
Thanks for registering! When you arrive at the ballpark enter at the First Base Gate in the designated Go-Ahead Entry lane

AND 'Learn more about GO-Ahead Entry' should display in green color with an underline announced

AND 'Done' CTA announced

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is directed to an external webview* opened to the URL that is configured in Remote Config (go_ahead_learn_more_url)

title: Onboarding FFI Enroll_Confirm
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed ANDROID 12.8.0 or later, iOS 12.3.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND USER is EITHER has Philly as Fave Team OR 
User has tickets to an upcoming game to PHI*

GIVEN user has ENABLED TalkBack on Android or ENABLED VoiceOver on iOS
custom_steps:
GIVEN User display with Context Card for GoAhead-Entry(FFI) Registration on Home Tab*

*iOS currently using Banner Link ' Go-Ahead Onboarding' (build 2266)- home context card functionality to come w/ a future build

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user successfully captured their facial image for Go-Ahead ID
AND NEC acceptance met
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Home plate icon should show in green color with MLB standard logo in it (SKIP THIS FOR 12.3 iOS and 12.8 ANDROID)

AND user display with loading indicator displayed when image validation is in-progress

AND lottie animation within home plate shows on screen while generating Go-Ahead ID

Text display:
Generating Go-Ahead ID...

THEN user should display with confirmation screen for successful enrollment in GoAhead announced

Green (dotted) check icon mark
Text:
You're all set!
Thanks for registering! When you arrive at the ballpark enter at the First Base Gate in the designated Go-Ahead Entry lane

AND 'Learn more about GO-Ahead Entry' should display in green color with an underline announced

AND 'Done' CTA announced

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on 'Learn more about GO-Ahead Entry'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is directed to an external webview* opened to the URL that is configured in Remote Config (go_ahead_learn_more_url)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on Done within Go-Ahead confirmation screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user taken to Home page of Ballpark App
AND user display with context card that they have successfully enrolled to Go-Ahead Entry
